actions.text: Amendment SA 2242, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 247.
Amendment SA 2242 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Casey to Amendment SA 2089.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2242 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Casey to Amendment SA 2089.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2242, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 247.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2242, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 247.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To establish a Federal-State partnership to provide access to high-quality public prekindergarten programs from low-income and moderate-income families to ensure that they enter kindergarten prepared for success, and for other purposes.
